summary: A black-out occurs during the meeting of a gang of criminals. When the light is back one of them is found killed with a stab on his back and all the clues point to a penniless man who had ... See full summary »
cast: Tomas Milian|Marina Ripa di Meana|Roberta Manfredi|Alberto Farnese|Massimo Vanni|Bombolo|Enzo Liberti|Enrico Luzi|Angelo Pellegrino|Renato Mori|Marino Masé|Leo Gavero|Enzo Andronico|Andrea Aureli|Antonio Cascio|Mario Donatone|Livio Galassi|Maurizio Gueli|Franca Mantelli|Marco Tulli|Sergio Sinceri|John P. Dulaney
title: El asesino del Tíber
